device.name: POCO M2 Pro / Redmi Note 9S / Redmi Note 9 Pro / Redmi Note 9 Pro Max / Redmi Note 10 Lite

maintainer.name: Ritesh Sahany
notes: Clean flash is recommended if coming from another ROM
GApps are included in the build

warning: Flashing custom ROMs may void your warranty. Make sure to backup your data before proceeding.

items: Spatial Audio: Enable virtualization effect (Make ordinary sound more immersive)
Spatial Audio: Enable binaural & transaural feature
Spatial Audio: optimize spatializer effect delay
Switch to Lenovo Dolby tuner, for the full Equalizer control

steps: Take a backup of your current ROM (optional but recommended)
